item.title: Custom 3D engine in Matplotlib
item.description: 3D rendering is really easy once you've understood a few concepts. To demonstrate that, we'll deisng a simple custom 3D engine that with 60 lines of Python and one matplotlib call. That is, we'll render the bunny without using the 3D axis.

item.title: Matplotlib in Data Driven SEO
item.description: At Whites Agency we analyze big unstructured data to increases client's online visibility. We share our story of how we used Matplotlib to present the complicated data in a simple and reader-friendly way.

item.title: Creating the Warming Stripes in Matplotlib
item.description: Ed Hawkins made this impressively simple plot to show how global temperatures have risen since 1880. Here is how to recreate it using matplotlib.
